The different names of Mount Vepulla and: Vepulla and the Buddha (the current Buddha)
The impermanence of conditions (a causal: This mountain’s name has vanished, those people have passed away, and that Buddha has become fully extinguished.
So impermanent are conditions, so unstable are conditions, so unreliable are conditions.
There will come a time when this mountain’s name will vanish, those people will die, and I will be fully extinguished.
Conditions are impermanent, their nature is to rise and fall; having arisen, they cease; their stilling is true bliss.
